code: import React from"react";import{Plugins}from"@capacitor/core";import{useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import{sessionTimeoutInSec}from"../util/Constants";const{App}=Plugins;export default function ApplicationState(props){var timeout;let history=useHistory();App.addListener("appStateChange",state=>{if(!state.isActive){timeout=setTimeout(()=>{history.push("/login");},sessionTimeoutInSec);}else{clearTimeout(timeout);}});return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null);}
